channel.title: How to add the hylian shield give me feedback its my first model

item.title: How to add the hylian shield give me feedback its my first model
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

cammyPVPftw:

what if i donate have a RAW folder. im also using PI.

The server you’re using doesn’t matter.
If you don’t have a raw folder, then your client doesn’t have the preloading feature and it needs to be added.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add the hylian shield give me feedback its my first model

item.title: How to add the hylian shield give me feedback its my first model
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

sk8rdude461:

I want proof this is your own work and not someone elses model.

I think if someone else released the model, and Elixium explained how to add it, no rules would be broken. That just seems like common sense to me, but then it does seem odd for us to be strict on enhancing others work especially given what our community is focused on.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add the hylian shield give me feedback its my first model
item.dc:creator: @Elixium Elixium
item.description:
@Elixium wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:536964”][quote author=MrFun link=topic=655781.msg4390181#msg4390181 date=1387174134]
Tell me if im wrong but shouldn’t this go in the model section?
[/quote]
Ironically it was moved from model section to here…

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,530415.msg3885379.html#msg3885379
^Links are down (lol) but I believe that looks like the same model (I asked for the models last year)
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,465700.msg3405358.html#msg3405358
^Has the shield added.

I want proof this is your own work and not someone elses model.[/quote]

My model isnt as detailed cause i made it in a hurry, also look at the triforce on my shield… its kind of caved in at one side. this model is not perfect like the ones you linked us to.

Read full topic

item.title: How to add the hylian shield give me feedback its my first model
item.dc:creator: @Elixium Elixium
item.description:
@Elixium wrote:

DIFFICULT: 1/10
SKILLS NEEDED: A BRAIN/COPY AND PASTE

okay this is very simple,
first navigat to your client folder, then open up itemDef.java
once your inside scroll down till u see this or something similar case 13362: itemDef.modelid = 62714; itemDef.name = "Torva full helm"; itemDef.description = "Torva full helm."; itemDef.modelZoom = 672; itemDef.modelRotationY = 85; itemDef.modelRotationX = 1867; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = -3; itemDef.anInt165 = 62738; itemDef.anInt200 = 62754; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[2] = "Check-charges"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; break;
Right under Break; paste in this code

case 15700: itemDef.modelid = 13717; itemDef.name = "Hylian shield"; itemDef.description = "For the Hero Of Time..."; itemDef.modelZoom = 1560; itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0; itemDef.modelRotationY = 500; itemDef.modelRotationX = 500; itemDef.anInt165 = 13718; itemDef.anInt200 = 13719; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear"; itemDef.itemActions[4] = "Drop"; break;
Now your done client sided! now goto your caches RAW folder and put these .dat’s inside:
https://www.dropbox.com/sh/3b37qpn6mi21vpx/7vgskey17Z
Your Done!! if you want to add stats check another tut cause im lazy
IN-GAME:

EDIT:
if you want to give it stats and stuff put this in server/data/cfg/item.cfg
hit ctrl + f and search for “15700” and replace that whole line with this:

Read full topic
item.source: How to add the hylian shield give me feedback its my first model
